course_title: The Modern Olympics: Power, Politics, and Performance

001.comments: This course is formerly KIN 383 . Students can receive credit for either KIN 383 or KIN 364
001.building: P. A. Woodward Instructional Resources Centre

0W1.comments: When wait-lists are used, it is the  STUDENTS' RESPONSIBILITY to check the SSC for changes made to their registration.This course is formerly KIN 383.  Students can receive credit for either KIN 383 or KIN 364

description: Examination of the Modern Olympic Games as an event with important political, economic, environmental, and cultural ramifications.
